title: PSSSB Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 157 Junior Engineer Posts
description: The Punjab Subordinate Service Selection Board (PSSSB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 157 Junior Engineer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ Diploma in Mechanical, Electrical, and Civil Engineering can apply for the PSSSB Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
